H0.text: What colour is the flower of the Celandine. Pink

H1.text: What colour is the flower of the Celandine. Purple

H2.text: What colour is the flower of the Celandine. White

H3.text: What colour is the flower of the Celandine. YELLOW

A4.text: The flowers consist of four yellow petals, each about 18 mm (0.71 in) long
